title: Which is worse to you guys, short flame or long harassment?
body:
I'm just curious. Here's what I would personally define them as:

The flame would be a short burst, like if someone was super tilted and just bursted out something like "BETTER PLAYER WINS XDDDD GET CANCER DIE", or something really bad like that, but is quiet the rest of the game.

The harassment would be over the  course of the game, constantly doing medium level bm'ing in all chat like "gj" when you die, "you're so shit" in all chat, "d4 negative wr", literally just harassing this person the entire game.

Which is worse in your eyes?

replies.body: I would never notice the diffrence. First Flame directed at me = full mute, no exceptions.

Harassment is ways worse. I literally had a guy hop on multiple accounts trying to add me so he could continue to flame me. Mind you, WE WON THE GAME and not one of us did bad. Lol I'm so lost sometimes at how toxic people can be in this game.

> [{quoted}](name=xKelborn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=20PcnLFU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-09-01T20:45:15.136+0000)
>
> Harassment is ways worse. I literally had a guy hop on multiple accounts trying to add me so he could continue to flame me. Mind you, WE WON THE GAME and not one of us did bad. Lol I'm so lost sometimes at how toxic people can be in this game.

I hope you took screenshots and reported him........not only for you, but for the next person he tries to do that to. That is taking harassment to EXTREME levels.

> [{quoted}](name=xox BaByDoLL xox,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=20PcnLFU,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-09-01T22:04:37.150+0000)
>
> I hope you took screenshots and reported him........not only for you, but for the next person he tries to do that to. That is taking harassment to EXTREME levels.

No sadly. I reported his Smurf account I was playing with but didn't get the other 2 profiles he tried to engage me with. ((I did accept both to confirm they were both him still)) In the end I just ended up blocking those profiles and went about my day. Tbh I tend to think it's not worth my time to report those guys in detail because it seems they're never dealt with properly. :/

Both are trash.
But prolonged is more annoying, but it's also more likely to get the person punished which is good.
Doesn't matter really. Mute both the yapping dogs. Report if feel warranted. Move on with my life.
I understand all kinds of toxicity are bad. I was just curious on which one people would be more willing to report, or rather, which one would warrant more of a punishment?

The system works with severity and consistency. So with your example, both could have about the same score at the end if reported.

I find both to be annoying, hence why I referred to them as yappy dogs.
Id report both of them if its bad enough. There is a difference between BMing and being toxic, the "Gj" example is a BM, while saying youre shit is being toxic.
